dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach collaboration with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach collaborations as competitive, focusing on individual strengths and achievements.
Your FarTwin will approach collaborations as cooperative, prioritizing teamwork and mutual success.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin analyze information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach analysis with a rigorous, evidence-based methodology, seeking to understand underlying causes.
Your FarTwin will approach analysis with an intuitive, holistic approach, considering the big picture and patterns.

dimensions.label: Growth Mindset
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach personal growth?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach growth with an optimistic, can-do attitude, embracing challenges and learning from failures.
Your FarTwin will approach growth with a realistic, pragmatic mindset, setting achievable goals and focusing on progress.

dimensions.label: Relationship Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin build relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach relationships with intensity, seeking deep connections and meaningful interactions.
Your FarTwin will approach relationships with a casual, easy-going attitude, valuing familiarity and comfort.

dimensions.label: Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach decision making with a data-driven, analytical mindset, seeking evidence-based solutions.
Your FarTwin will approach decision making with an intuitive, instinctual approach, trusting their gut feelings and instincts.

dimensions.label: Innovation Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach innovation?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach innovation with a radical, disruptive mindset, seeking to challenge the status quo and create something entirely new.
Your FarTwin will approach innovation with an evolutionary, incremental approach, building upon existing ideas and solutions.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves through writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach writing with a concise, to-the-point style, valuing clarity and efficiency.
Your FarTwin will approach writing with a dramatic, expressive style, seeking to engage and captivate readers.
